word-target_field_explanation: The canonical form of the word in the target language
word-origin-script_field_explanation: The word-target in the script of the origin language
word-origin_field_explanation: The translation of the word-target in the origin language as an array if multiple translations are possible
word-definition: The first-person singular pronoun used to refer to oneself.
word-usage_field_explanation: The usage of the word-target in the target language, if necessary
word-part-of-speech_field_explanation: The part of speech of the word-target
word-grammar-notes: The word 'я' is a personal pronoun in Ukrainian and does not change by case.
word-grammar-notes_field_explanation: Additional grammatical information about the word-target.

word-examples.word-example-target-field_explanation: The example of the word-target in the target language as an array, each word or character is a separate element in the array
word-examples.word-example-origin-script-field_explana: The word-example-target-array in the script of the origin language
word-examples.word-example-translation-field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array. Each element in the array should correspond to the element with the same index in the word-example-target-array. Each array should therefore have the same length.
word-examples.word-example-translation_field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array in the origin language as a single string

word-examples.word-example-target-field_explanation: The example of the word-target in the target language as an array, each word or character is a separate element in the array
word-examples.word-example-origin-script-field_explana: The word-example-target-array in the script of the origin language
word-examples.word-example-translation-field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array. Each element in the array should correspond to the element with the same index in the word-example-target-array. Each array should therefore have the same length.
word-examples.word-example-translation_field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array in the origin language as a single string

word-examples.word-example-target-field_explanation: The example of the word-target in the target language as an array, each word or character is a separate element in the array
word-examples.word-example-origin-script-field_explana: The word-example-target-array in the script of the origin language
word-examples.word-example-translation-field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array. Each element in the array should correspond to the element with the same index in the word-example-target-array. Each array should therefore have the same length.
word-examples.word-example-translation_field_explanati: The translation of the word-example-target-array in the origin language as a single string

word-examples_field_explanation: The examples of the word-target in the target language as an array. Only include examples using the canonical form of the word-target.

word-inflections.word-inflection-origin-script_field_expl: The word-inflection-target in the script of the origin language
word-inflections.word-inflection-explanation: Used for possession (Genitive) or as a direct object (Accusative).
word-inflections.word-inflection-translation_field_explan: A translation of the inflected word when applicable

word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-explanation: Using 'мене' in the Genitive case to express possession.

word-inflections.word-inflection-origin-script_field_expl: The word-inflection-target in the script of the origin language
word-inflections.word-inflection-explanation: Used when something is given to or done for the subject.
word-inflections.word-inflection-translation_field_explan: A translation of the inflected word when applicable

word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-explanation: 'Мені' is used to indicate the indirect object.

word-inflections.word-inflection-origin-script_field_expl: The word-inflection-target in the script of the origin language
word-inflections.word-inflection-explanation: Used to indicate the means or instrument by which an action is performed.
word-inflections.word-inflection-translation_field_explan: A translation of the inflected word when applicable

word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-explanation: 'Мною' is used in the instrumental case to indicate who performed the action.

word-inflections.word-inflection-origin-script_field_expl: The word-inflection-target in the script of the origin language
word-inflections.word-inflection-explanation: Used to indicate location or state.
word-inflections.word-inflection-translation_field_explan: A translation of the inflected word when applicable

word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-translation: The cat is sleeping on me.
word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-explanation: 'На мені' is used to indicate location.

word-inflections.word-inflection-origin-script_field_expl: The word-inflection-target in the script of the origin language
word-inflections.word-inflection-explanation: The base form, used as the subject of a sentence.
word-inflections.word-inflection-translation_field_explan: A translation of the inflected word when applicable

word-inflection-examples.word-inflection-example-explanation: 'Я' is used as the subject of the sentence.
